title: No results found when searching via Package view selection and dialog (1GLDN1X)
description: When searching for declarations via the Package view selection and dialog, no results are displayed even though the fully qualified name is initialized in the Search dialog. However, searching via the context menu in the packages view works as expected.
OB: The package view initializes the Search dialog with the fully qualified name. However, when searching for declarations, the fully qualified name is not found. It should first try to get the Java element and if that fails, it should display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
SR:
1. Open the Package view.
2. Select a package from the list.
3. Right-click and select 'Search' from the context menu.
4. In the Search dialog, enter a fully qualified name and click 'Search'.
5. Observe that the search results are displayed correctly.
6. Now, click on the package in the Package view.
7. Select 'Search' from the toolbar or press 'Ctrl + H' to open the Search dialog.
8. The Search dialog should be initialized with the fully qualified name of the package.
9. Enter a fully qualified name and click 'Search'.
10. Observe that no search results are displayed.
11. The search should first try to get the Java element and if that fails, display the element name instead of the fully qualified name.
